# Precision Frontend Engineering

> We build web apps, micro SaaS products, and AI-powered tools for modern businesses.

## About

Precision Frontend Engineering is a software development company specializing in production-ready web applications, B2B tools, and AI integration. Founded by Kyle Langford, a senior frontend engineer with 14+ years of experience.

## Services

- Web Applications: Full-stack apps with modern frameworks, APIs, and cloud infrastructure
- Micro SaaS Products: Focused software products that solve specific business problems
- B2B Tools & Dashboards: Internal tools, admin panels, and data-driven interfaces
- Agentic Workflows: Autonomous AI agents that automate complex multi-step processes
- AI Integration: LLM-powered features, embeddings, and intelligent web apps
- Developer Tools: Workflows, tooling, and systems that improve developer experience

## Tech Stack

Vue, Svelte, TypeScript, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Tailwind, Vercel, OpenAI, Anthropic

## Projects

- Spend Analyzer: https://spend-analyzer.precisionfrontend.com
  A micro SaaS tool for understanding spending patterns with CSV import and interactive charts.

- ReadableJS: https://readableJS.precisionfrontend.com
  A developer tool that analyzes JavaScript code for readability and maintainability.

- QR Holo: https://holo-qr.vercel.app
  Generate QR codes with holographic visual effects.

- (Add)ictive Programming: https://addictiveprogramming.com
  Technical blog covering web development, AI integration, and mental health in tech.
